hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Set the below parameters manually package_name="nginx-ingress-controller" published_version="0.13.0"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi cat /etc/os-release source /home/test/.bashrc #Install dependency cat /etc/os* export WORK_DIR=`pwd` sudo yum install -y tar wget gcc wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.10.1.linux-s390x.tar.gz chmod ugo+r go1.10.1.linux-s390x.tar.gz sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.10.1.linux-s390x.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin cd /usr/bin sudo ln gcc s390x-linux-gnu-gcc go version
#Build sudo yum install -y git make export GOPATH=$WORK_DIR export DOCKER=docker mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/k8s.io/ cd $GOPATH/src/k8s.io/ git clone https://github.com/kubernetes/ingress-nginx.git cd ingress-nginx/ git checkout nginx-0.13.0 make build
#Test sed -i "s/ -race//g" $GOPATH/src/k8s.io/ingress-nginx/Makefile
git diff
cd $GOPATH/src/k8s.io/ingress-nginx/ make test 2>&1 | tee test_logs grep FAIL: test_logs 2>&1 | tee failed_logs
echo "--- FAIL: TestCreateApiserverClient (0.00s) --- FAIL: TestHandleSigterm (0.00s) --- FAIL: TestStore (0.00s) " >> Expectedfailed_logs
diff -u --ignore-all-space -B <(sort Expectedfailed_logs) <(sort failed_logs)
